description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. It’s that time of year again! "You know who" is back with his construction partner, Fobahr, to help build some decorative delectable destroyable eggs! COLOR, PAINT, STICKER, SAVE, SHOW OFF AND DESTROY!!! With your help and the help of technology, the Easter Bunneh can once again spread his hard boiled painting joy to children and adults alike around the globe.
